infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: M-Hike needs access to your camera to take photos of hikes and observations.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: M-Hike needs access to your photo library to select photos for hikes and observations.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: M-Hike needs your location to automatically fill in hike locations and show them on the map.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: M-Hike needs access to your calendar to add hike events.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow M-Hike to access your camera to take photos.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow M-Hike to access your photos to attach them to hikes.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow M-Hike to use your location to automatically fill hike locations.
